I have the same problem, however, I could not find the reason. How to solve it? Thanks very much!

prediction_depth = sess.run(prediction_depth) depth_loss = tf.sqrt(tf.reduce_mean(tf.square(prediction_depth - train_label_aug))) depth_loss = tf.log(depth_loss) print sess.run(depth_loss) optimizer = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(0.0001).minimize(depth_loss) _, l = sess.run([optimizer, depth_loss])

body:
I have the same problem, however, I could not find the reason. How to solve it? Thanks very much!

`prediction_depth = sess.run(prediction_depth)
depth_loss = tf.sqrt(tf.reduce_mean(tf.square(prediction_depth - train_label_aug)))
depth_loss = tf.log(depth_loss)
print sess.run(depth_loss)
optimizer = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(0.0001).minimize(depth_loss)
_, l = sess.run([optimizer, depth_loss])`
